entry.title: Shop Max® Wipers (30 x 60s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: Shop Towel
Price: 112.79

The Tork® Advanced ShopMax Wiper Roll Towels are strong enough to power through oil, grease, and solvents, yet versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills. Its thick, cloth-like construction is highly absorbent and low linting, making it an effective, convenient towel for shop, auto and home. These multipurpose disposable towels are an excellent replacement for cloth rags. Their durability and high-performance characteristics make them a perfect choice for a wide variety of uses, from detail work in professional shops and garages to cleaning tools in do-it-yourselfers' workshops and garages. This product contains 85% paper content (60% recycled, 40% postindustrial) and 15% synthetic emulsion.
  • Tough on grease, grime and dirt and versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills
  • Highly absorbent and low linting
  • Excellent replacement for cloth rags
Type All-Purpose
Width 11"
Colour White
Description Tork Advanced - Wipes
Ply 1
Sheets/roll 60
Sheets/case 30
Sold/priced per Case
Manufacture Code 450160

entry.title: Clorox Healthcare® - Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaning/Disinfectant Wipes (185ct Refill)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CLOROX
Type: Disinfectant Wipes
Price: 44.39

Clorox Healthcare® Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaner Disinfectant Wipes are ready-to-use and have disinfecting times as short as 30 seconds for 1 step cleaning & disinfecting. Clorox Healthcare® Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaner Disinfectant Wipes are ready-to-use and have disinfecting times as short as 30 seconds for 1 step cleaning & disinfecting. These wipes are Health Canada registered to kill the germs that are of greatest concern to public health. When you need to disinfect those high–touch “hot spots” (desktops, handles, faucets, water fountains, toys, etc.) — you can’t afford to use products that require long contact times to kill germs. Helping to better disinfect the school environment - from classrooms to gyms to nurse’s offices — and protect students and staff from the spread of germs.

  • Kills 38 pathogens in 60 seconds or less
  • Pre-moistened, durable, ready-to-use wipes
  • Does not leave a solid residue
Qty/container 185

entry.title: Clorox® Healthcare® - Disinfecting Wipes (110ct Refill)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CLOROX
Type: Disinfectant Wipe
Price: 36.28

 Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are great for cleaning and fighting bacteria & virus throughout your home. These disinfecting wipes kill 99.9% of bacteria, including cold and flu, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria. Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are easy to use and work on a variety of hard, nonporous surfaces, including mirrors and glass. The powerful cleaning technology dissolves kitchen grease and fights soap scum. For convenient cleaning and disinfecting, keep this canister in your kitchen or bathroom or at your desk at work. Use these wipes anywhere messes or dirt may build up. Clean and disinfect anytime with the convenience of Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting.

  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
  • Kills cold and flu viruses, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria
  • Clear-drying formula works on a variety of surfaces
  • Powerful cleaning technology fights kitchen grease and soap scum
Wipes/Canister 110
Length
6-3/4"
Width 9"
Manufacture Code
01308

entry.title: SENTRON™ 6 Black Nitrile Gloves 6-MIl - Large (100/cs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: RONCO
Type: Nitrile Gloves
Price: 29.87

Highly resistant to hydrocarbon oils, fats, detergents and solvents, SENTRON™ 6 is perfect for industrial applications that require a tough disposable glove. Made from 100% nitrile, SENTRON™ 6 offers excellent dexterity and tactile sensitivity and is stronger and more tear and puncture resistant than vinyl or latex gloves of the same thickness. It's tough hand protection that is preferred by law enforcement, corrections and customs officials and tattoo artists for its comfort during long wear. SENTRON™ 6 is also CFIA accepted for use in the food industry. 

  • Highly resistant to hydrocarbon oils, fats, detergents and solvents
  • Excellent dexterity and tactile sensitivity
  • Stronger and more tear and puncture resistant than latex gloves of the same thickness
  • No allergy causing proteins
  • Textured for better grip
Size Large
Quantity 100/box
Material Nitrile
Length 9.5"
Thickness 6-Mil
Colour Black
Powder/Powder-Free Powder-Free

entry.summary:
Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: Work Glove
Price: 130.68

  • 12 Pairs KleenGuard™ G60 Level 3 Economy Cut Resistant Gloves per pack (1 pack / case); Size Medium; Black & White
  • ANSI Level 2 / EN388 Level 3 Cut Resistance, CPPT = 686 grams
  • Made with ultra-high-molecular-weight polyurethane (UHMWPE) yarn with nylon and Lycra fiber provides cut resistance and a comfortable fit
